title: BRIEF-Nzuri Copper Updates On Proposed Acquisition Of Co By Xuchen International Ltd
text:
BRIEF-Nzuri Copper Updates On Proposed Acquisition Of Co By Xuchen International Ltd

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Sep 02, 2019 15:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Nzuri Copper Updates On Proposed Acquisition Of Co By Xuchen International Ltd Sept 2 (Reuters) - Nzuri Ltd : * UPDATES ON PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF CO BY XUCHEN INTERNATIONAL LIMITED * NZURI HAS BEEN ADVISED BY XUCHEN/CHENGTUN THAT THERE ARE LIKELY TO BE FURTHER DELAYS IN RECEIVING CERTAIN PRC REGULATORY APPROVALS.

BRIEF-Nzuri Copper Updates On Proposed Acquisition Of Co By Xuchen International Ltd
